price: 49. Oyó nde bokundoli, mpe babangi bakozalaka na bozongi bolamu.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
